articles.description: Ford makes the Time Top 100 Most Influential Companies list with a spotlight on its rivalry with Rivian and what's at stake.
articles.content:
This time, Ford Motor Co. made the cut.
The Dearborn automaker earned a shout-out from Time magazine for being among the Top 100 Most Influential Companies of 2022 "making an extraordinary impact ar… [+6050 chars]

articles.author: Maria Merano
articles.title: GM to expedite Hummer EV production as reservations increase to 65,000 - Teslarati
articles.description: General Motors (GM) is expediting Hummer EV production after receiving more than 65,000 reservations. “Production’s actually slightly ahead of plan, and we’re putting things in place now to actually expedite that as well, so we can deliver these reservations …
articles.content:
